about_the_game:
Sharded World: Backpack Adventure - Unleash the strategic genius of a zombie slime!

Enter the exciting world of Sharded World: Backpack Adventure, where every choice you make is critical. Embark on an adventure by controlling a zombie slime that can take over heroes' bodies and utilize their unique abilities. Strategically gather equipment, skillfully upgrade and combine items, and take part in duels where every move can decide the outcome of the battle


Dynamic PvP Battles: Fight in intense one-on-one battles in real-time, where every decision you make can decide the outcome of the battle. Be ready to adapt your strategy and tactics in response to your opponent's moves.




Innovative Backpack System: Customize your backpack with a unique hexagonal grid that allows you to create powerful combinations of items. This system opens up limitless possibilities to customize and optimize your gear.




Individual heroes with unique stories: Each of the four available heroes has their own unique abilities and talents, allowing you to delve deep into their development. From the Teen Mage to the mighty warrior, choose the hero that best suits your tactics and play style.




Talent Progression: Each hero class has its own talent progression that you can develop and customize to suit your needs. Upgrade and select talents to enhance your hero, making his equipment and abilities more powerful and effective.




Game modes for every mood: Whether it's intense competition in Ranked Mode or more relaxed play in Normal Mode, find your perfect battle style and dominate your opponents.


Next Level Customization: Transform your gaming experience by customizing the interface, backgrounds, and themes. Let every aspect of the game reflect your personality.




Motivating Challenges and Rewards: Immerse yourself in daily challenges that are not only fun, but also reward you with tokens to purchase exclusive customization items. For each achievement in the game, you will be rewarded with unique decorative items.



Every choice is important, from choosing your hero to the moment you place items in your backpack. Purchase, upgrade, and combine items to create gear that will help you in battles. Confront other players' innovative strategies, analyze their combinations, and develop counter-strategies to achieve supreme domination of the dungeon!

Don't miss your chance to become a dungeon legend! Add 'Sharded World: Backpack Adventure' to your wishlist on Steam to support us and speed up game development. Pack your backpacks, prepare for battles and prove that you are a real strategist!

  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
